name: Saikyou Ginsei Mahjong
overview: ■ Seriously no match without cheating! Game against six characters! Six characters of various characters appeared. At the beginning, only 3 people will be able to select an opponent if certain conditions are satisfied. ■ Budo function It is possible to leave play competition game results of players. It is also possible to record data of various angles and to analyze player's fingers. ■ Fulfilling functions We have a variety of functions for enjoying games, safe functions for beginners, such as waiting tile display and dora warning display.
